definition: to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip

sentences.english: This paper talks about some test-taking strategies for English writing in NMT from several aspects.
sentences.chinese: 本文从几个方面谈论了高考英语书面表达的备考策略。

sentences.english: This course also serves as a preparation course for students taking the graded ABRSM practical examinations.
sentences.chinese: 本系列也是备考英皇演奏考级的课程之一。

sentences.english: When I was preparing for put graduate exams, she did the cooking and urged others to help me.
sentences.chinese: 当我准备考研究生时，她做饭，并敦促别人帮助我。

sentences.english: He spent last week preparing for the civil service exam.
sentences.chinese: 上周，他在准备考公务员。

sentences.english: The students are busy preparing for the college entrance examination.
sentences.chinese: 学生们正忙着准备考大学。

sentences.english: This year I took the preparation seriously and regarded every simulation exam as the real one, " he says."
sentences.chinese: 今年我认真备考，把每次模拟考试都当做实战来对待。

sentences.english: Do you want to  study together for the exam?
Insist on listening to every day to develop their own machine the hearing ability and the reference appendix state.
sentences.chinese: 每天坚持听机经来培养自己的听力能力及备考状态。

sentences.english: Toward unripe can make full use of these resource for reference for his help strength.
sentences.chinese: 往届生可以充分利用这些资源为自己的备考助力。

sentences.english: and I did study like a prep class.
sentences.chinese: 而且我参加了备考的培训班。

sentences.english: Xia spends her weekends, and her family's spare cash, attending tutoring sessions to help prepare her for the examination.
sentences.chinese: 她用家里的余钱参加周末的补习班，帮助自己备考。

sentences.english: Most students who pass the prelims started studying before spring quarter.
sentences.chinese: 大部分首轮通过的学生都在春季学期就开始备考。

sentences.english: Study on Methods for National Customs Declarant Qualification Test and Its Analysis.
sentences.chinese: 论全国报关员资格考试及其备考方法分析。
